title: Tim Flach

title: Hell Ships (by HLA)
description: This single page applications displays a history event when Japanese began transferring POWs by sea, known as Hell Ship(s). All the details and videos were collected by HLA Team including the interviews of few of the survivors.

title: F-Troupe
description: F-troupe was launched in 2003 by self-taught designer Mick Hoyle and has built up a loyal following around the world. The London-based footwear label is loved for its original and off-beat designs that span from androgynous brogues to cute sandals to tomboy boots.
technology: Wordpress, PHP, HTML, CSS and JavaScript.
role: Development and deployment of a complete E-Commerce solution.

description: TAKUMI.LA is an online space showcasing some very special and unique things from all around the world.
